inventory.youCanGet: You can get parts for free by playing
inventory.tip: Items arranged in your rooms will not appear on this page.

merge.removedFromTheRack: miners will be removed from the rack
merge.arePlaced: miners that are placed in your room. To use this miner for craft, move it from the room to your inventory.
merge.craftingInfo: Make your miners more powerful with Merge! You need to have two identical miners, some RLT and same level parts to convert two low-level miners into a higher-level one! Every new level of upgrade brings you more mining power. There are 6 levels: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary and Unreal. Basic (Common) level miners can be purchased in the
merge.upgradedMiner: . Parts for crafting have only 5 levels, and they are easy to find in a Merge Components Case, which is also available in Season Store, or you may craft them from low-level parts.

collection.collectMiners: 收集矿工获得强大的总功率奖励
collection.youCanGet: You can get parts for free by playing

infoHints.craftingInfo: Make your miners more powerful with Merge! You need to have two identical miners, some RLT and same level parts to convert two low-level miners into a higher-level one! Every new level of upgrade brings you more mining power. There are 6 levels: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary and Unreal. Basic (Common) level miners can be purchased in the
infoHints.storageTitleTooltipText: Here you can find and manage your miners, racks and parts for crafting.
infoHints.inventoryInfoMessage: Items that you have not used yet are stored here.
infoHints.collectionInfoMessage: Here you can view the miners you've received and merged, and the ones you have not yet.
